com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.delegate

Class DDLDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.delegate.DDLDelegate

  • public class DDLDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    Delegate used to generate DDL for making database changes.
    Author:
    vvia

        public static java.lang.String getAddColumnSQL(DBMetaData dbmd,
                               java.lang.String columnName,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               boolean bLastColumn)
        Used to create the sql for adding a new column within a create new table command.
        Parameters:
        bLastColumn - true if this is the last column being added for table.

      • getAddColumnSQL

                               java.lang.String columnName,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String params,
                               boolean bLastColumn)
        Used to create the sql for adding a new column within a create new table command.
        Parameters:
        parms - example: "NOT NULL"
        bLastColumn - true if this is the last column being added for table.
